I m playing csgo since 2015 but i ve never seen so much cheaters in this game like today. I think csgo is goin dow down down Every time u want to play a competitive match , you end up with cheaters ( wall hackers , aim hackers , spin bots , etc ). I have to say that i have prime account and in the last days i had global elite rank and supreme and still full of hackers. This is worse than cs 1.6. 

I dont recommend this game.I ended up by deleting it.
